item.description:
Sacred Sound Journey to Your Mighty I AM Presence
Friday, Sept. 30, 7:00-9:00 p.m. $15
With Judy, Dave Estes and Clarence Dow
- the trio now known as Mystic Sound

With the multidimensional sounds of the Didgeridoo, cello, crystal and Tibetan signing bowls and a gong, as well as other sound surprises, your BEing will ride the sound currents to upper levels of your consciousness. While vibrations bring you to a highly expanded state, Judy steps you into your Mighty I AM Presence. Don't miss this special event. Expect a felt sense of this higher vibration and an integration of the Mighty I AM within your energy field and your conscious awareness. Featuring didgeridoo player Dave Estes and cellist Clarence Dow, along with the angelic beings sure to arrive in great numbers. Please arrive by 7, with cell phones off. When the event is over please stay for snacks and you may also get a chance to experience the didgeridoo being vibrated into your heart chakra!

For a list of all programs go to www.AHigherBalance.com
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door to the left of H&R Block, go up one flight, take a right to the end of the hall. Center is above Starbucks.
item.name: Sacred Sound Journey to your I AM PRESENCE
